name: Earth Escape (Australorp)
description:
Earth Escape!

An action game made for the first Bevy Game Jam.
Survive and prolong humanity by dodging as many asteroids as possible.
The amount of asteroids will constantly grow as they build an unfair advantage.
So, you must use your reflexes, wit, and momentum to overcome the insurmountable odds!
The Earth will be lost if it touches 5 or more asteroids at a time, good luck...

Controls:
WASD to move
Space to pause
R to restart after defeat
F11 to toggle fullscreen
